too?\""},{"lineNumber":112825,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、アマデス……君……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Amadesu... you...\""},{"lineNumber":112826,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ニミッツちゃん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nimitz-chan...\""},{"lineNumber":112827,"originalJapaneseLine":"「君が魔人になって、ここにいるって聞いた時は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When I heard you became a demon and were here,"},{"lineNumber":112828,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最初は信じられなかったけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"at first, I couldn’t believe u...\""},{"lineNumber":112840,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それより、ずっと気になってたんだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"More than that, I’ve been worried about something else for a long state...\""},{"lineNumber":112843,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":112844,"originalJapaneseLine":"最後に会ったのは、夕暮れの教室、","translatedEnglishLine":"The last were,"},{"lineNumber":112846,"originalJapaneseLine":"セックスをしている現場だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"caught in the act of having sex."},{"lineNumber":112847,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ニミッツちゃん、先生と仲が良かったから……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nimitz-chan, you were close to the teacher..."},{"lineNumber":112848,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やっぱりショックだったんじゃないかって」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I thought it must have been quite a shock for you.\""},{"lineNumber":112849,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぜ、ぜぜぜ、全然全然！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no no no, not at not!\""},{"lineNumber":112851,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……本当？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Really?\""},{"lineNumber":112852,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うんっ、うんっ、うんっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yeah, yeah, yeah!\""},{"lineNumber":112853,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":112854,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……昔村にいた時よりも","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You seem brighter than when you were in the old village."},{"lineNumber":112855,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだか明るくなったね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow, you’ve become more cheerful.\""},{"lineNumber":112856,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":112857,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どんな生活してるんだろうと思ってたから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was wondering what kind of life you were living,"},{"lineNumber":112858,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ホッとしたよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I'm relieved.\""},{"lineNumber":112859,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、明るく……？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-brighter...?\""},{"lineNumber":112860,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そ……そう、かな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is... is that so...?\""},{"lineNumber":112861,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":112862,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう、なら……いいな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If that’s true... I’m glad...\""},{"lineNumber":112863,"originalJapaneseLine":"負い目、コンプレックス、憧れ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Guilt, complexes, admiration,"},{"lineNumber":112864,"originalJapaneseLine":"様々なものをニミッツはアマデスに対して","translatedEnglishLine":"various feelings Nimitz held toward Amadesu,"},{"lineNumber":112865,"originalJapaneseLine":"抱えていたが、それらが少し軽くなっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"were all somewhat lightened now."},{"lineNumber":112866,"originalJapaneseLine":"（アマデス君……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Amadesu-kun..."},{"lineNumber":112867,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やっぱり……いい人、だな……）","translatedEnglishLine":"You really are... a good person...)"},{"lineNumber":112868,"originalJapaneseLine":"（偶然だけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"(It’s by chance, but..."},{"lineNumber":112869,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだか、会えて良かった……のかも……）","translatedEnglishLine":"somehow, I’m glad I met you... maybe...)"},{"lineNumber":112870,"originalJapaneseLine":"「死ねーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Dieeeeeee!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスさまには困ったものですわねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's such a handful, isn't he, Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「イベットさんにも問題ありますわよ？
ちゃんと嫌なことは嫌と言わないと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you don't properly say you dislike something,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの方はすーぐ調子に乗って――」
くりっ、とイベットは小首を傾げた。
「君が魔人になって、ここにいるって聞いた時は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When I heard you became a demon and were here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初は信じられなかったけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: at first, I couldn’t believe it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わた、私、魔人なんかになって……
び、びっくりさせたんじゃないかって！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought I might have surprised you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「別に謝ることじゃないような」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: not really something you should apologize for."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むしろ、大変だったんじゃないかって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rather, I was worried you might have had a hard time,
that’s what I was concerned about."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより、ずっと気になってたんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More than that, I’ve been worried about something else for a long time..."
it was in such a state..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後に会ったのは、夕暮れの教室、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The last time we met was in the classroom at dusk,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アマデスとメルフェイスが、
セックスをしている現場だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: caught in the act of having sex.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ニミッツちゃん、先生と仲が良かったから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nimitz-chan, you were close to the teacher...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱりショックだったんじゃないかって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I thought it must have been quite a shock for you."
"...You seem brighter than when you were in the old village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだか明るくなったね」
「どんな生活してるんだろうと思ってたから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was wondering what kind of life you were living,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負い目、コンプレックス、憧れ、
様々なものをニミッツはアマデスに対して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: various feelings Nimitz held toward Amadesu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 抱えていたが、それらが少し軽くなっていた。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You really are... a good person...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだか、会えて良かった……のかも……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: somehow, I’m glad I met you... maybe...)

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスさまには困ったものですわねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's such a handful, isn't he, Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「イベットさんにも問題ありますわよ？
ちゃんと嫌なことは嫌と言わないと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you don't properly say you dislike something,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの方はすーぐ調子に乗って――」
くりっ、とイベットは小首を傾げた。
「君が魔人になって、ここにいるって聞いた時は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When I heard you became a demon and were here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初は信じられなかったけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: at first, I couldn’t believe it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わた、私、魔人なんかになって……
び、びっくりさせたんじゃないかって！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought I might have surprised you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「別に謝ることじゃないような」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: not really something you should apologize for."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むしろ、大変だったんじゃないかって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rather, I was worried you might have had a hard time,
that’s what I was concerned about."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより、ずっと気になってたんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More than that, I’ve been worried about something else for a long time..."
it was in such a state..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後に会ったのは、夕暮れの教室、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The last time we met was in the classroom at dusk,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アマデスとメルフェイスが、
セックスをしている現場だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: caught in the act of having sex.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ニミッツちゃん、先生と仲が良かったから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nimitz-chan, you were close to the teacher...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱりショックだったんじゃないかって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I thought it must have been quite a shock for you."
"...You seem brighter than when you were in the old village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだか明るくなったね」
「どんな生活してるんだろうと思ってたから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was wondering what kind of life you were living,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負い目、コンプレックス、憧れ、
様々なものをニミッツはアマデスに対して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: various feelings Nimitz held toward Amadesu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 抱えていたが、それらが少し軽くなっていた。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You really are... a good person...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだか、会えて良かった……のかも……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: somehow, I’m glad I met you... maybe...)
